section.name: Artifact Installation (jcr.jar)
section.p: Download jcr.jar from http://www.day.com/maven/jsr170/jars/jcr-1.0.jar , then install it :

section.name: Repository configuration
section.p: Plugin-jsr170 can work on Jackrabbit or Alfresco repositories. The configuration is done in the jsr170_context.xml, there you will be able to choose a repository type.
